main_definition: The positive aspects or advantages of something, often used in the context of discussing options.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Skilled athletes who are under contract to a professional sports team
meanings_and_examples.example: When he signed with the NBA, he joined some top pros.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The beneficial aspects or advantages of something when considering different options
meanings_and_examples.example: After reviewing both job offers, she decided that the position at company X had better pros.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A colloquial term for professional wrestling matches, emphasizing high skill and competition level
meanings_and_examples.example: He was thrilled to watch some of the best pros in action during the live event.
